title: StarCraft 2: SERIES of the Year? Proxying EACH OTHER's Natural! (Astrea vs Percival)
excerpt: Very fun best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Percival (Terran) and Astrea (Protoss). This may very well be the best series of professional StarCraft 2 of 2022.
